MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 07-JAN-2021 12:30.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the EH48 postcode area of Bathgate. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:04am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulties within the substation and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:48am on Thursday, 7th January 2021.
